description: A well deserved victory for Juve despite a first half far from brilliant for Sarri's men. The Bianconeri changed agear in the second half and created several opportunities to score, showed a solid wall in defence an plenty of options in attack. The Bianconeri still have a margin for improvement buy they are certainly on the right path.
Ronaldo gets himself on the scoresheet having been fed throught by Dybala. Game over if we were in any doubt. Assist by Dybala.
Havertz sees his close-range effort ell held.
Havertz is shown the yellow card
